# Install & build ðŸ› 

### 1. Download UniRep repository from GitHub

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Unirep/Unirep.git && \
cd Unirep && \
git checkout v1.0.1
```

### 2. Install packages and build

```bash
yarn && yarn build
```

### 3. (Optional) Run test scripts

```bash
yarn test
```
